byline.original: By GLENN THRUSH and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump was no stranger back in the day to the art of news management. But even that did not seem to prepare him for the capital press corps.
snippet: Donald J. Trump was no stranger back in the day to the art of news management. But even that did not seem to prepare him for the capital press corps....

headline.main: Trump Ruled the Tabloid Media. Washington Is a Different Story.
headline.print_headline: Trump Ruled the Tabloid Media. Washington Is a Different Story.
